software.name: redmine
software.description: Redmine is a flexible project management web application written using Ruby on Rails framework.

template_files.title: configuration of email
template_files.content:
production:
  email_delivery:
    delivery_method: :smtp
    smtp_settings:
      address: _Engines_System(smtp_host)
      port: 25
      domain: _Engines_System(default_domain)
      enable_starttls_auto : false

software.installation_report_template:
Goto _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/ 
Login with 
user:admin
password:admin

Change admin's password and keep a record these credentials are not saved by Engines
